channel.title: Server Hosting ~~~ Need Help
channel.description:
I'm using Project Annihilation. My purpose is to work with this project between home computers, see myself and ect. I have setup no-ip, and I have use uturrent for port forwarding. I open the PJA_user client, and change the 127.0.0.1 ip to my no-ip address. I then sent that same client to my second computer. On my host computer, I open up no-ip, then use eclipse to run the server. Then go on my second computer, open up client.. then nothing happens, I get a connection error.
[b]What I'm I doing wrong here? Do I need to add something to the server file? Or add something to Client? Or something with eclipse?[/b]

item.title: Server Hosting ~~~ Need Help
item.dc:creator: @Maximu Maximu
item.description:
@Maximu wrote:

I’m using Project Annihilation. My purpose is to work with this project between home computers, see myself and ect. I have setup no-ip, and I have use uturrent for port forwarding. I open the PJA_user client, and change the 127.0.0.1 ip to my no-ip address. I then sent that same client to my second computer. On my host computer, I open up no-ip, then use eclipse to run the server. Then go on my second computer, open up client… then nothing happens, I get a connection error.

What I’m I doing wrong here? Do I need to add something to the server file? Or add something to Client? Or something with eclipse?

Read full topic
